# List of presidents of the Landtag of Saxony__disambig_1

President of the Landtag of Saxony
In the 1831–1918 period, Saxony had a bicameral legislature. It consisted of the I Chamber and the II Chamber.

beside his clenched fist, Walter Dönicke (* July 27, 1899; † April 19, 1945) lies on the floor of the city hall in Leipzig. He committed suicide rather than face U.S. Army troops who captured the city.]]
